opt.prob

Class MIMIC

  • java.lang.Object
    • opt.OptimizationAlgorithm
      • opt.prob.MIMIC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Trainer

    public class MIMIC
extends OptimizationAlgorithm
    Based on the MIMIC algorithm J. S. De Bonet, C. L. Isbell, and P. Viola (1997). MIMIC: Finding Optima by Estimating Probability Densities, Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems, Vol. 9 .
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MIMIC

        public MIMIC(int samples,
     int tokeep,
     ProbabilisticOptimizationProblem op)
        Make a new mimic
        Parameters:
        samples - the number of samples to take each iteration
        random - how many of those samples should be completely random
        theta - the starting theta
        increment - the increment
        stoppingCount - the minimum number of good samples needed to continue
        op - the problem
